United States Court of Appeals
                        For the First Circuit
                         ____________________
Nos. 00-2077, 00-2078

     STANLEY A. RODOWICZ, MARGARET STEVENS, AND JAMES LEMON,
               Plaintiffs, Appellees, Cross-Appellants,
                                  v.

             MASSACHUSETTS MUTUAL LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY,

                Defendant, Appellant, Cross-Appellee.


                         ____________________


                            ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this court, issued February 4, 2002, should
be amended as follows:
p 3, fn 2:       underline "I"
p 9, line 6:     change "its jury instructions" to "his jury
                 instructions"
p 10, fn 7:      insert space after "ยง"
